metadata.Title: CVE-2019-10044 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: Telegram Desktop before 1.5.12 on Windows, and the Telegram applicationsfor Android, iOS, and Linux, is vulnerable to an IDN homograph attack whendisplaying messages containing URLs. This occurs because the applicationproduces a clickable link even if (for example) Latin and Cyrilliccharacters exist in the same domain name, and the available font has anidentical representation of characters from different alphabets.

criterions.comment: telegram-desktop package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
